column4: hi all. how do you uninstall a programme on ubuntu. trying to uninstall truekrypt
you can use a GUI or the CLI - which one do you want?
hi. im new to ubuntu and still learning the system. how do i do that???
you can go to system/administration/add remove software
dasda: try devede. best software ever!
i cant find it in there
sorry, forgot to ask what version of ubuntu you are using
the new one 9-10
then open system/administration, the first item should be add/remove
first thing on that lis is janator. nothing in there for add/remove
strange but doesn't really matter, further down should be an item "synaptic ..."
yes i can see package manager
start that please, you have to type *your* passsword
ok done that
now in the quick-search textbox type the name of your app
ok found that
in front of your app there is a green icon, right click on it and choose "mark for removal"
ok done that
and now select "apply"
thank you so much. it worked great! sorry for sounding a bit thick lol. this is only my 3rd day on ubuntu after many years using that other os.
don't worry, we are here to help - have fun
